page.title: 10Life in Yarde
page.content: I{live in Yarde}with my mother,father and brother. Our house is called Yarde Farm because it was {once a working farm.} There are eleven other homes,but soon an{old barn}that is being converted will be{another house.}Most of the people are retired. There is only one other child apart from us. There is no longer a working farm in Yarde so the{fields around are } owned by farmers in{other villages. {Our}house was also once an inn but now there is no inn, no shop and no school. We{travel to school by car.}My brother and I like to ride our bicycles; sometimes Dad takes us out on the roads. We also play in the fields and like to dam up the stream. {Yarde is a nice place to live. }
